title: Insanely easy fix to the damage problem.
body:
Simply change all %pen items into %bonus pen 

This allows assassins to reach their 0 armor,but also allows tanks to be playable due to always having some armor. 

Also true damage should be toned down, but at this point I’ve given up on that horse.

There is a reason why people don't like Tanks.

First off, they're boring. 

You can't name a single tank that' has remotely interesting or fun mechanics. 

Only ones that do have it are {{champion:57}} and {{champion:154}} 

But that's 2. Only 2. Even then, their combos consist of every other tank combo.

Cc chain them into another cc chain which in turns goes into another which disables the enemy's ability fight back. That's incredibly one-sided and boring.

Secondly, the tank meta was one of League's most boring and uninteresting metas. Season 7 was NOT fun in the slightest. Full tank comps are the reason no one ever dealt damage.

Not saying this season is any better. Now there's too much damage, I can agree with you on that. But that doesn't stop tanks from being good. They're not complicated to win with.

You don't have to be a hashinshin fan to hate tanks. Over half the time I think he's just stupid and biased.
